metadata.title: CVE-2021-38385 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Tor before 0.3.5.16, 0.4.5.10, and 0.4.6.7 mishandles the relationshipbetween batch-signature verification and single-signature verification,leading to a remote assertion failure, aka TROVE-2021-007.

criterions.comment: tor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
